features.name: transfer_amount
features.rationale: High-value transfers attract additional screening and increase anomaly likelihood.
features.mitigation: Split the transfer into staged releases with dual approval.

features.name: daily_velocity
features.rationale: Spikes in outbound velocity relative to baseline suggest compromised access.
features.mitigation: Throttle release cadence and confirm funding instructions with treasury.

features.name: anomalous_counterparties
features.rationale: Recent alerts involving the counterparty increase fraud probability.
features.mitigation: Run enhanced due diligence on the counterparty before approving.

features.name: auth_risk_score
features.rationale: Elevated auth risk (device, step-up failures) is a strong fraud signal.
features.mitigation: Require step-up MFA and verify initiator identity.

features.name: device_trust_score
features.rationale: Trusted devices materially reduce fraud risk.
features.mitigation: Harden device posture checks and re-register untrusted devices.
